title: The Bargain
description: To save her twin sister, 18-year-old Alexandra agrees to live for one year on Luciferâ€™s Island, a private resort where she will become a sex toy, to be used and enjoyed by visitors to the island. As a sheltered innocent, she has no idea what perverse sex acts wait for her, or the betrayal she will face. She is transformed into a willing participant, taking control of her destiny and pleasure.
author: Maggie Chatterley
